Methods

prep()

prep(object $data, string $field) : void

Prepare the rule for reuse.

Parameters

object $data

The full set of data to be filtered.
string $field

The field to be filtered within the data.

Tags

None found

getMessage()

getMessage() : string

Get the error message; note that this returns the message whether or not there was an error when validating or sanitizing.

Returns

string

Tags

None found

getParams()

getParams() : array

Gets the params passed into the filter.

Returns

array

Tags

None found

getValue()

getValue() : mixed

Get the value of the field being filtered, or null if the field is not set in the data.

Returns

mixed

Tags

None found

setValue()

setValue(string $value) : void

Set value of field, creating it in the data if needed.

Parameters

string $value

The new value of the field.

Tags

None found

is()

is() : bool

Is the value valid?

Returns

bool —

True if valid, false if not valid.

Tags

None found

isNot()

isNot() : bool

Is the value *not* valid?

Returns

bool —

True if not valid, false if valid.

Tags

None found

isBlankOr()

isBlankOr() : bool

Is the value blank, or otherwise valid?

Returns

bool —

True if blank or valid, false if not.

Tags

None found

fix()

fix() : bool

Sanitize the value, transforming it as needed.

Returns

bool —

True if the value was sanitized, false if not.

Tags

None found

fixBlankOr()

fixBlankOr() : bool

If the value is blank, set to null; sanitize if not blank, transforming it as needed.

Returns

bool —

True if the value was set to null or sanitized, false if not.

Tags

None found
